title: How to avoid a communication breakdown minimum of 200 words - Quora

response.answer_text: Questions on Quora that specify the exact number of words required for the answer are obviously exact copies of an assignment set by a course that someone is following. I don’t mind helping with grammar questions or a request to explain a word or a phrase or a concept that someone doesn’t understand, but I am not willing to do someone’s homework for them and be told the number of words that I have to write.
